name: pizza tower sage 2019 with some unused content
name_original: pizza tower sage 2019 with some unused content
description:
basically another unused content mod that i made but with more things
controls:
x - shift
c - grab
s - taunt
v - chainsaw
b - bullet spread
a - pistol
you can also aim with pistol
d - spawn barrel
f - slap
also the cheeseslimes can hit you
